resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158482</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158482</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2862</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Language Summer School</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SprachencSommerakademie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cours d'été De Langage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escola De Verão Da Língua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Corsi estivi Di Linguaggio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχολείο γλωσσικού καλοκαιριού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Escuela De Verano Del Lenguaje</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson plan for an activity where students write a recommendation for a hebrew/arabic language summer school suitable for a british student,, based on advertisements which the schools have published. Includes an assessment rubric.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">advertisement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">recommendations.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Lektionplan für eine Aktivität, in der 
Kursteilnehmer eine Empfehlung für eine hebrew/arabic 
Sprachensommerakademie schreiben, die für einen britischen 
Kursteilnehmer verwendbar ist, basiert auf Reklameanzeigen, die die 
Schulen veröffentlicht haben. Enthält eine Einschätzung 
Rubrik.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan de leçon pour une activité où les 
étudiants écrivent une recommandation pour des cours d'été de 
langage de hebrew/arabic appropriés pour un étudiant britannique, 
basé sur les annonces que les écoles ont éditées. Inclut une
rubrique d'évaluation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta da lição para uma atividade onde os 
estudantes escrevam uma recomendação para uma escola de verão da 
língua de hebrew/arabic apropriada para um estudante britânico, 
baseado nas propagandas que as escolas publicaram. Inclui um 
rubric da avaliação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di lezione per un'attività dove gli 
allievi scrivono una raccomandazione per i corsi estivi di linguaggio 
di hebrew/arabic adatti per un allievo britannico, basato sulle 
pubblicità che le scuole hanno pubblicato. Include una rubrica 
di valutazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για μια δραστηριότητα όπου οι 
σπουδαστές γράφουν μια σύσταση για ένα εβραϊκό/αραβικό σχολείο
γλωσσικού καλοκαιριού κατάλληλο για έναν βρετανικό σπουδαστή., 
βασισμένο στις διαφημίσεις που τα σχολεία έχουν δημοσιεύσει. 
Περιλαμβάνει μια ρουμπρίκα αξιολόγησης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan de la lección para una actividad donde 
los estudiantes escriben una recomendación para una escuela de verano
del lenguaje de hebrew/arabic conveniente para un estudiante 
británico, basado en los anuncios que las escuelas han publicado. 
Incluye una rúbrica del gravamen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reklameanzeige</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Empfehlungen.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">publicité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">recommandations.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">propaganda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">recomendações.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pubblicità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">raccomandazioni.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαφήμιση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συστάσεις.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comprensión de la lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">anuncio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">recomendaciones.</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
